extendedInfo.description: Well no one did the icon Vote... :)   Too ambitious!  I'll figure one out on my own ...------  Explanation of problem #2 still applies...Here's the deal with the app name.  The app name has to be unique, so it doesn't clobber other apps in the market.  Check out some of the custom launcher apps, like LauncherPro, which let you rename apps to whatever you want in the launch screen, if you want to call it something besides Mashcord.---------------------------------APP DESCRIPTION:Ever wonder why you never end up recording the things on your cellphone you really want to record?  Maybe it's because it takes for freaking EVER to get to the phone's Video Recorder function!  By the time you get it open and into video recording mode, whatever you wanted to record has already happened!Well now you can just open Mashcord, and go straight to your phones INTERNAL camera software's video recorder.  That's right, no third-party crappy encoding, you're using the same camcorder you always do, but it only takes one click to get there, straight into video recording mode!  Add a shortcut to your Home Screen for even faster access!---Features- Easy 1-click access to your phone's internal video recording mode camcorder- No third party encoding, low quality video, etc- Add a shortcut to your home screen for even faster access

reviews.title: Finally...
reviews.comment: I\'ve been back and forth between different shortcuts, and - as previously mentioned,  this is the only full-featured, no b.s. shortcut I\'ve found.  Works great with Jellybean on S III!  I don\'t have to stop and save every freaking video!   Thanks, and great job.  Now if you could change the icon to some cool video camera pic and I\'d be set!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Could use a better icon, and maybe say camcorder underneath.  But it preforms perfectly on xt910(ISC 4.0.4)! Ignore all the 1 star ratings, just morons who don\'t realize it is just a shortcut for Android devices that do not have a camcorder shortcut already i.e. all of them not running an alternate home app.
reviews.author: Thomas Fraser

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is the only one I have found so far that takes you into the full camcorder. By that I mean HD, camcorder setting\'s and all. All the others I have tried just let you use Qvga and some settings are missing. I am on Droid Bionic. Thanks for this. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only camcorder shortcut that works on Razr
reviews.comment: Would like option to record automatically on launch, but given it records without green dots and at high resolution, can\'t complain! Good work, Dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix! Creaters!
reviews.comment: Having only 1 problem with this app and everything else works great. Sometimes when you exit out of the app, the resolution changes it\'s self down to the lowest setting on my galaxy s2, so that the next time you open to quickly record a video, instead of recording in HD, it records in 171r. I have lost a few good moments due to this. This is the only issue i have encountered after 7 months of use. Letting you guys know because i see its still not fixed and not sure if yal are aware of it.
reviews.author: Timothy Buckner

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: just wat i was  searching for.... for godsake change the icon..
reviews.author: SAJAD KHAN

reviews.title: Full-Featured
reviews.comment: This is the only direct-to-camcorder-mode shortcut I\'ve found that is exactly that, directly to the camera including all menu options and video/photo list. All others disable the list, the option to toggle back to regular camera and don\'t save the video automatically (lost a couple because of that). Not crazy about the name, though ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I cant record
reviews.comment: I want an app that I can record my screen while playing minecraft like its recording my screen not me.And it doesnt stop recording when go to another app  plus there is no pro version and its free.If it cost money $1.00
reviews.author: Austin Yarbrough

reviews.title: does what it says
reviews.comment: ..quickly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best one!!!
reviews.author: Tom A

reviews.comment: This is a great app and works perfectly on my Nexus 7.
reviews.author: Norman Sharp

reviews.title: Top
reviews.comment: Simple and perfect! Working flawless.
reviews.author: Thomas Martin

reviews.title: Its crap
reviews.comment: Its just a short cut to the original camera on ur device
reviews.author: Peyton Dismuke

reviews.title: Does nothing
reviews.comment: If you\'re looking for an app that does nothing, this is the app for you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do anything more than what current camcorder shortcut does. Now if you could get it to open AND start recording,that would ROCK!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works like a champ moto razr
reviews.comment: Launches Hd, others launch in maintenance mode.

reviews.comment: As stupid
reviews.author: John Hands

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Unlike \'Camcorder Shortcut\', this app takes me to the camcorder but also gives the option (like the stock camera app) to switch between cam/video modes too! Excellent on GNexus and Nexus10.
reviews.author: Kelly Chasney

reviews.title: Bam.....done
reviews.comment: I wanted quick easy access to my phones video recorder and not a bunch of extra stuff with it. Also the big red dot is easy icon to find!

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Right now I would give this a total 0. All this app does is take you to the phones normal web came. UNINSTALLING!
